text: We are deeply grateful
to the more than 1300 learners
who donated to our campaign.
Because of your donations,
OCW will receive a total matching gift of
$76,000 from MathWorks.
That will go a long way
towards helping us make our content
richer and more accessible
to every learner in the world.
Thank you again for helping to sustain OCW
and for celebrating 15 years of open sharing.
On behalf of the entire OCW team
here in Cambridge, Massachusetts,
I want to thank you for your support
of OpenCourseWare. It's such a
privilege to us to be able to
publish all these courses that
are so useful to people around the world.
Thank you again!
